attributes.action: Put a stop to the extortionate prices that medical drug companies charge
attributes.additional_details: Wolmans Disease can not be cured, but requires treatment on a weekly basis for the rest of the life of the sufferer. The NHS have refused to fund the treatment for this baby girl. And have been quoted £6k a week to pay to have their daughter have my quality of life, and she may not see her first birthday and will die of malnourishment without the treatment.
attributes.background: Inaayas Story. 3 month old baby girl diagnosed with Wolmans Disease, currently in Birmingham Children's Hospital. NHS refuse to pay for treatment, and family have to pay £6k a week for medication.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
